name: B-Kare: Delivery Rush
description:
Delivery workers are the disregarded everyday heroes: biking around and  delivering as fast as they can.

Try to make all your deliveries before your time is up. 
But be careful!
The city is full of surprises, the virus is out there and some choices might have important monetary consequences.

[Edit]: There are 4 deliveries, however the second signifier can't be seen because of the screen size. It is the house on the middle on the right side, sorry about it!

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Pick-up packages from the Hospital and take them to the right house before the time ends!
  • You have to go back to pick-up the next package before knowing the new delivery location.

CONTROLS:

  • Use: W-A-S-D or ARROWS to move around.
  • Use your mouse to aim and LEFT click to shoot the virus.
